text: Ebyo (babikola lwa kuwa Mukama Katonda kitiibwa) era bulijjo buli yenna agulumiza emizizo gya Katonda ekyo kye kirungi gyali mu maaso g'a Mukama omulabiriziwe. Era mwakkirizibwa okulya (ennyama y'e) bisolo ebirundibwa, okugyako ebyo ebibasomerwa mu ngeri y'emu mwewale amasanamu olw'obubi bwago, era mwewale ebigambo ebitemerere
